name: Alphonse John PRITCHARD, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary of Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Tony Miller, Director of Correctional Industries et al., Appellees

parties: Alphonse John PRITCHARD, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary of Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Tony Miller, Director of Correctional Industries et al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of March, 2009, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

965 A.2d 1207
Alphonse John PRITCHARD, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary of Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Tony Miller, Director of Correctional Industries et al., Appellees.
